beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 16 ▓▓▓▓|$hero_name leans|on the gate to|the man-Village.

beats.text: ‘Well. Here we are. This is the last page of the journal. The end of the trail.’ |VS| $hero_name looks at the gate leading to $storyNeighborhood, then down at you.
‘I... I cannot cross this line, Little man-cub. My claws are too sharp for their houses,’ |VS| said $hero_name taking a step back, creating distance between both of you.

‘|VS|Taking the complete journal from their backpack $hero_name said |VS|, ‘Don't look so sad! You have the strength of the Wolf, the wisdom of the Panther, and the wit of the Bear. You will be the best in there. Even Shere Khan wouldn't dare follow you where you are going.
|VS| $hero_name gives you a final, warm smile, though their eyes look heavy. Then, they start the journey back to the jungle without looking back, but with the satisfaction of a well done job.
